p: Logistic regression analysis, adjusted for age, gender and baseline APACHE II score found that CT did not predict any of the outcomes. Odd Ratios were 0.99 (95 % confidence interval = 95 % CI 0.98-1, p = 0.2) for infection, 0.99 (95 % CI 0.98-1, p = 0.37) for sepsis, 0.99 (95 % CI 0.98-1, p = 0.64) for bacteraemia and 1.00 (95 % CI 0.99-1.01, p = 0.71) for mortality, respectively.
